title: Ultra Soft Bath Towels Set of 8, Bath Sheets Quick Dry,2 Oversized Towels Large/2 Hand Towels/4 Washcloths, Microfiber Shower Towels Absorbent Textured Bathroom Towels For Hotel Spa Beach (Sea Blue)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Huge, soft, and quick drying.', 'author': 'Chris', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The first thing to know about these towels is that they are microfiber. Like with bedsheets and blankets, some people will love the feel of microfiber and some will not.They're very big—big enough for a nearly 300 pound guy to wrap around with room to spare.They're very soft—you could hand one to someone and tell them it's a throw blanket.They're very absorbent—they will feel strange at first, coming from cotton, but they get the water off better than cotton ever did.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Solid towel set', 'author': 'Brent Kellohen', 'rating': 5, 'content': "When unpacking this towel set, I had some concerns about the absorbancy. The material felt like it might have pilling issues in my dryer but I didn't run into any issues after usage for a week.The material is very soft and feels almost like microfiber which made some water sit on top of the towel rather than absorbing into it, but otherwise it is very soft and feels high quality.Time will tell how well these hold up to daily use with the washer and dryer cycles.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Absorbent but Thin', 'author': 'Mara Maroney', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'As a bigger person I wanted giant towels and that’s what I got! The towels are very soft and surprisingly absorbent despite being thin. The texture is kinda strange and bath mat-like, but I got used to it.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Extra large', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Soft, large but not very absorbent. Pretty though', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Not a bath towel , may be a cheap beach towel', 'author': 'Sandy', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'Not what I expected, described as a bath towel not sure why they are extremely thin might cut them up to use as rags', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft', 'author': 'Natasha Heaton', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These have to be the softest, biggest towels I’ve ever had I love them', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Great for a blanket, not so great as a towel', 'author': 'Keith Huntington', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Full disclosure: I received this item as part of the Vine program.I cannot give these towels a good review... as towels. These come in a compressed package, and after you let them un-compress, then run them through the wash and dry cycle, these towels comes out SUPER soft and fluffy. They feel like those fleece throw blankets. Really nice.But have you ever tried to use a fleece blanket as a towel? Don\'t. And these towels are like that: look good, super soft, but as a towel they aren\'t very absorbent, and they "stick" to your skin while drying. It\'s like trying to dry yourself off with a large cotton ball. (Go ahead, grab a cotton ball and dry to dry a wet hand. It\'s like that.)I couldn\'t dry myself off and had to switch towels after my first shower using these, just to finish getting dry.But like I said, these are super soft and would make great blankets for your pets. I\'m planning on donating these to my local animal shelter, who are always looking for used towels to use as blankets for the animals. Not what I planned, but it\'s not a total loss that way.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 14, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft, dries quickly', 'author': "c'est la vie🎉😘", 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I recently purchased this set of 4 oversized bath towels each measure 35x70 inches and I am very satisfied with my purchase.The towels are made of high-quality material, which makes them very absorbent and soft. They are also durable and can withstand multiple washes without losing their shape or color.The extra-large size is perfect for wrapping around my body after a shower, and they cover a large surface area, which makes drying off much quicker.The towels come in a set of 4, which is perfect for a small family or for use in a guest bathroom, the towels are great quality, absorbent, and comfortable, good value.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 25, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars EXTREMELY SOFT', 'author': 'El', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Came in variety of sizes including a very large size. Cannot stress enough how soft these are. More microfiber style than anything. Hopefully the included photo shows this. I even use the largest one just to keep warm at times.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Oh my damn!!!!', 'author': 'Ellis', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I have NEVER felt towels SO SOFT! They are akin to a fleece throw, and arrived before we got out of bed! (Ordered Saturday night, were here Sunday morning)As I wash everything before wearing/using, these 100%polyester towels dried just like using 100% cotton towels! I like to drip-dry, while husband pats himself dry ... both of us ended up wrapped up in these gloriously soft towels for HOURS, while enjoying a movie and some nosh.... ❤️', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

It happens to be the same color, and the Turkish cotton matches the fine quality of the original towels. I bought this set of 4, and now have an extra two for when the first two get worn. The price was a good bargain, too !! Win, win!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not Terribly Impressed', 'author': '09CD', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Got the bathroom set yesterday. Looked pretty good - not as thick as the Pinzon sets I’ve been using for years, but not bad. Quite a few loose threads around the borders.Instructions read “WASH BEFORE USING”, which I did according to the label. Put them in the dryer on low/no heat and had to remove a quilt from the lint trap between dryer cycle one and two, then another equally thick quilt at the end of the third cycle. A lot more loose threads around the border and some of the Knapp was pulling out.Positive - nice looking set (love having extra washcloths).Holds a good amount of water - took numerous drying cycles on low heat to completely dry them.Negative - the lint factor was everything everyone reviewing here stated. Hope that doesn’t continue or I’ll have lace doilies after a dozen washings.More loose threads than I was expecting. Again, I hope these hold up. Only time will tell.As a point of comparison- I’ve been using several sets of Pinzon towels (which I can no longer find) for about eight years before the washcloths started coming apart. They were VERY heavy and thick, and extremely well made.Why do all of the quality items disappear so quickly? ☹️', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars XLNT MED WEIGHT TOWEL SET', 'author': 'Kathleen D Boyd', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I originally purchased 2of these 8-piece towel sets in Wedgewood Blu& Moss Green. Later, I purchased the set in the Plum color. I am very satisfied with these towels. The colors are well saturated and vibrant. However, the Plum color is more of an Amethyst or Light Purple. I washed themseparately, as indicated on each package. And I'm very glad that I did.The lint-trap in my dryer was FULL of the colored lint from each particular set that I had washed (alone). Each set of towels were very soft & fluffy after they finished drying withminimal shrinkage. I am very satisfied with these towels & am very thankful that they're not too heavy. I suffer from Osteo-Arthritis ofboth hands, wrists and shoulders. I consider these towels to be a real Blessing. They'resoft, absorb water well, dry quickly & look very beautiful in my bathroom. Also, the fact that each towel has 2 wash cloths is aBig Bonus for me. I use 1 wash cloth for my face & 1 wash cloth formy body; Love It. Since there are 8 pieces to each towel set, I plan towash each color alone in the future. I kinda believe that the amount of lint left, after drying, is due to the generous amount of dye used in these towels; which is a good thing to me. I do highly recommend this item. If you're on-the-fence, try one set & see how they work for you. The price is Very Reasonable + you can always return them👍", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 19, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Off colored', 'author': 'Allie', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Nice bathroom towels, however, the color is much more drab than in the photo.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars see below', 'author': 'Jud H.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Extraordinary value for the price and quality. title: Sand Cloud Turkish Bath Towels Bundle for Bathroom, Set of 4 (Terra Sage) - Large Size - 100% Certified Organic Cotton Yarn is Lightweight, Soft & Absorbent - Premium Bath & Hand Towels Dry Faster
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Awesome!', 'author': 'heartcozy', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love the lightweight over all feel, doesn’t take up so much space like regular towels do. The terry size is perfect for drying off post shower. It’s overall just a perfect towel. A bit pricey at $80 for two bath towels and two face towels but worth it overall. I will be buying another set. And now I keep my old regular towels for utility purposes like mopping floors and washing the car. title: JML Bath Towels, Microfiber Bath Towel Set 6 Pack 30" x 60", Soft Absorbent Microfiber Towels for Body, No Fading Microfiber Bath Towels for Adult, Grey
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product', 'author': 'H. Goslow', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Update, bought these June 2020, it is now April 2021- These towels are holding up well, Colors have all stayed the same except the yellow has dimmed slightly but all others are same vibrant, I am actually happy the yellow slightly dimmed. No smell as I was having with the other microfiber bath towels I had purchased. These have/are working out great, I am not seeing wear or tear also which you see after many usages, so strong sturdy. I do use a detergent that has no dyes in it, I wash on cold water (microfiber does not do well in heat) and tumble dry on low, which does take longer in the dryer but worth it for these wonderful towels. Still a 5 star for these even after many months of usage.To explain where I am coming from, about 8 months ago I bought some micro-fiber towels (different than these) to try out. They were thinner, more like the microfiber you clean glasses or screens with. You can see the difference in texture on the picture with the purple towels, the lighter grey is the previous style. We got use to the blotting vs rubbing, but we loved that we could dry ourselves quickly and hang the towels vs a cotton towel, we would walk around a while with the towel wrapped around us as we were still wet and did not want to put clean cloths on until we were dry. This kept towels in bathrooms vs finding them in bedrooms or other weird places. This was awesome and we were sold on the microfiber bath towels. Due to the slimness we even changed up our bathrooms with simple hooks vs towel bars. Eight months had passed of heavy use of these towels, and using microfiber laundry soap, hang drying or no heat setting in dryer. They started to retain a smell, we tried using regular detergent thinking that might help but no they still stink.Loving the microfiber towels for the quick drying after a shower, we discussed maybe a different type of microfiber cloth (we use microfibers in a few places in the house and there are many types of microfiber textures) Our towels in our kitchen, which we bought about the same time, and get heavy use but we did buy many more of them, so it might be a rotation thing, do not have any sort of smell. So for our bath towels we decided to go with a texture similar to those. Which are these towels! We just barely had these arrive, so I will try to do an update a few months down the road, but lets get to my first impressions.Colors- oh wow the colors are amazing, We purchased the grey, yellow, green 6 pack and the Blue, brown, purple 6 pack. You get 2 of each of the colors. The grey is a bluish grey that fits almost any bathroom. The green is a sage green and yellow is more earthy so not too bright. The purple is a royal purple, it looks much lighter in description pictures, the blue is a very bold blue (we bought for the purple and brown) The brown is more of a milk chocolate color (I was hoping for a deeper brown, which I think they may have but it is with the lighter purple and blue) So the earthier (green, yellow, brown) we have in one bathroom and the bold purple, blue, grey (now this grey could have matched the earthy set, so if just getting one pack and you want an earthy feel for your bathroom, go with the yellow, green and grey set)Size- perfect even if you wanted to wrap around you, but as I said with the microfibers we just dry, hang, and get dressed, no need to wrap, but if you wanted to, yes these are 3 inches shorter than the average xl towels but with out the bulkiness it is easy to tuck in and will stay if you really want to wrap. (I use to be a wrapper so I understand the size issue, I think that is why I still get such large towels, maybe I should look into slightly smaller as these do seem over kill, yes it took me a review to realize this size thing is ingrained from years of cotton towel use)absorbency- I do have a separate hair towel, very thick hair and I do walk around with my hair in that towel for awhile so this review is just for face and body. After fully drying off (less than 1 min to do) Towel still seemed dry, but I know it took off a ton of water, it did feel slightly heavier so I know the water was in it. So great absorbency. I will say from my previous microfiber towels where you put on and blotted, this could move more like a terry or cotton towel but not quite, I guess it is half way between the two types. So if this is your first body microfiber, I would say to get use to blotting, but if you had the type we had previously, this is a welcome change as it doesn't stick as strongly to your body and you can move the towel a little to wipe vs pure blotting. Still dried my body just as quick, one swipe in each area and all water gone as with all microfibers that I have ever used. So I guess no surprise there. Our old ones you could see where they were darker (more water) to lighter (dry part of towel) This I am not sure as I can not tell it even has water in it besides the weight.Texture-very soft, and fuzzy, with these being microfiber (which grabs everything *why it grabs water off your body so well) I plan to only wash with the other body towels, not with my kitchen or dog microfiber towels.Hanging- These have their hanging tab in the middle of the long way! This so far is my only con about these towels, I personally have hooks so they can hang down fully, so I will be getting some ribbon and sewing a hook on 1 corner. If you have a towel bar in your bathroom, this would not even faze you.As I said before, our last towels got a smell that we can not get out, so this time, I bought enough to wash each towel after 2 days which is higher rotation (previous towels 7 days) so stay tuned for an update after a few months, fingers crossed that it will still be a 5 star rating. Don't forget to buy a hand towel or two that matches, I will need to do that, forgot to get a few hand towels.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 10, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect', 'author': 'Mars', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Good quality and easy to use. Perfect absorbing very soft and smooth and light weight. Fast dry too! The perfect towel ever.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Thinner, softer, more absorbent than my cotton towels, what's not to love?", 'author': 'J. Wells', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These are exactly what I was hoping they would be! Thin, light, yet very absorbant. They are excellent! I'm a big guy, and even relatively expensive traditional cotton towels always left me feeling clammy after a shower, which is just annoying. I know it's possible to do better, because I have used things like super-chamoise and the like which pick up every drop of water off of the skin with the barest little swipe. I don't need that level of water absorption, but I hate feeling a sheen of water all over after drying off with a regular towel. It feels more like those towels are pushing water around than actually picking it up.I was hoping these microfiber towels would be somewhere between a cotton towel and a super-chamoise in absorption, and I was absolutely not disappointed! In my experience, if I start with drying my arms for example, by the time I finish drying my legs my arms have already finished air-drying what moisture was left over. I'm always nice and dry by the time I walk out of the bathroom now, which is exactly what I was looking for.While these towels are much more absorbent than cotton towels, they are also quite a bit thinner. They are nice and fluffy, yet thin enough to be thrown in my gym bag without any trouble. They do stretch a bit, which is kind of weird, but it hasn't caused any issues with using them, it's just different than what I'm used to.My only concern right now is because they were so inexpensive, I'm not sure how long they will last. I haven't noticed any quality issues after visually inspecting them, and after using them for several showers everything seems fine, but I haven't even sent these through the wash cycle yet so I don't know.Basically if you don't see me coming back here to complain about the quality in six months, you know they worked out fine for me. Otherwise these are excellent towels, and I would definitely recommend them!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2018', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!', 'author': 'LJM', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I did not buy these for personal use but for giving my 50lb pit/boxer mix baths. She has allergies and needs baths every week to ten days or so. I washed these right away when I got them without fabric softener as I do with any microfiber towels I have and they came out great. Still really soft and no shedding in my lint trap.Gave my dog a bath the next day and these were a game changer!! She was sooo much dryer than when using a cotton towel of ANY size! And I only had to use one. I bought the pack of six in gray and am really glad I did.I used one on the floor and didn’t even need it. I kept going back over her body with the towel and it just kept on sopping up the water. Her paws were still wet and I found a couple dry spots on the towel and sure enough it was enough to do the job without busting out the extra towel.I’m very impressed so far. Now if they hold up I will be even more so but I don’t see why they won’t. The stitching seems good and if properly washed for my purposes I don’t see why I won’t have these a while. I don’t think I would like these for myself as I’m not a big fan of the way microfiber towels feel on my skin, but if you’re cool with that, you may want to check these out. I wouldn’t hesitate to use them for these purposes though. They’re awesome for dog baths!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I love these micro fiber Towels ❤️', 'author': 'Suzanne W.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I first used this item at my sister in laws house and loved them. They take up 1/2 the room in my linen cabinet. The absorption of water is fantastic. I have really thick long hair and these towels soak up so much water it cuts my drying time in half.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars SOOOO soft', 'author': 'LINDSAY CARPENTER', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Fantastic product!!!So soft. title: POLYTE Oversize, 60 x 30 in., Quick Dry Lint Free Microfiber Bath Towel Set, 6 Piece (Gray)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great towels, great price', 'author': 'swimmir320', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very soft and absorbent, fast drying. Beautiful shade of gray. Great price! Very happy with my purchase and will buy more in the future.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars They absorb so nicely.', 'author': 'Vic', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These are the best towels that I have ever had. I have been using them for about 4 years now. I do find out that after a years use, that I need to replace them because they aren't as soft as at first. But I always seem to go back to these. They are a little different, but doesn't take long to get used to them. I would suggest that anyone looking for a nice soft, absorbent and no lint towel, these are the ones for you!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 23, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Shedding Woes Begone, Embracing the Weirdness for a Dry Laugh!', 'author': 'Praneeth Sangani', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I opted for the Quick Dry Lint Free Microfiber Bath Towels after battling the shedding nightmare with my previous ones, and I must say, it's been a mixed bag.On the positive side, these towels live up to their lint-free claim. No more fuzzy annoyances driving me crazy, and that alone is a game-changer.However, the microfiber material does take some getting used to. It's a bit weird initially, and the texture feels different from traditional towels. But, once you adjust, the absorption power is quite impressive.Speaking of absorption, these towels do a fantastic job of soaking up water. Despite the initial oddity of the microfiber, its ability to quickly dry and absorb moisture is a significant plus.In summary, the Quick Dry Lint Free Microfiber Bath Towels are a win, especially if you're coming from the land of shedding towels. The microfiber might feel a tad strange at first, but the lint-free, quick-drying benefits make it a solid choice.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 2, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THESE TOWELS', 'author': 'Madea', 'rating': 5, 'content': "OMG! At first I thought, what am I doing buying micro fiber towels, then when I got them home, WOW, I should have bought these a LONG time ago!They are VERY soft, VERY absorbent and are exactly the dimensions as advertised.I was soooooo surprised that when I went to wring out my washcloth, it wrung out sooooo dry that I thought I had never gotten it wet. It reminds me of the chamois I use on my car, LOVELY!The instructions are very explicit...do NOT rub dry, but PAT dry...and it works. I am so used to rubbing the towel all over to get me dry and with these all I have to do is pat, pat, pat and I am completely dry. I LOVE THEM.Then when I hang them up after showering or drying my hands, the towels feel like they are already dry, hardly any water left behind.My husband was very skeptical when I hung them up, he groaned and moaned about them being micro fiber because he has rough hands and he just knew they were going to snag on his rough skin...but they DIDN'T!!! Under his breathe he muttered that he was happy with them. LOLI love these towels so much that I have ordered us another set.We love the size of them too, large enough to reach around after you've showered and when I use the washcloth to rinse my face, I cup my hand with the washcloth in it and fill it with water to splash on my face and it holds all the water, no other washcloth has done that. (thumbs up)I think I've said everything there is to say about these towels...they are fantastic, get yourself a set and you'll thank me afterwards. You're welcome :-)", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 3, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great towels', 'author': 'Mareus', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These towels are soft and thirsty! They dry quickly. Full disclosure, my husband didn’t like them, his complaint is that “they felt funny”. If you are opposed to newer technology, then these aren’t for you. If you want large bath towels that dry nice and quickly, get them. Great value for the money. They aren’t thick, won’t take up a lot of space in your linen closet, or if you have to pack them for travel', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 5, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Does not absorb water well', 'author': 'riddhi jhunjhunwala', 'rating': 3, 'content': "It is really soft but I feel like it doesn't dry me that well", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 13, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Like it so much I bought a second set!', 'author': 'Vivipic', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I live full-time in an RV and they are notorious for retaining humidity. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent towels at a great price.', 'author': 'PAISLEYMAMA', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Of course, it is recommended to wash and dry the towels 2-3 times before use; to fluff them up and get all the lint out. I love that the towels are patterned at all; instead of usually solid-colored towels. Honestly, I wasn\'t interested in the plain grey towels, and bought 4 sets, only to keep the patterned towels, and donate the plain ones. title: Oliven 4 Piece Brown Cabana Stripe Washcloths Set 13"x13" Soft Highly Absorbent Quick Dry Bathroom Towels Microfiber Plush Towels Set Woven Towels for Kitchen Hotel Spa Gym
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Nice Towels!', 'author': 'LZ', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These are pretty nice. Need wash it first, because there is LOTS of lint!! After that, they are very absorbant and soft and the right amount of thick. You know how some towels say "cotton" but they don\'t absorb, they just kinda spread the water around? These don\'t do that! They\'re actually really good! Much better than my last bath towel purchase from Amazon.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Huge towels with nice fuzzy feel that actually dry out in a reasonable amount of time', 'author': 'Jeff Warner', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I got these towels as a compliment to the bathroom we are redoing. I usually prefer towels that are predominately cotton or with a high percentage of cotton I think just because that's what I've always been used to. The problem is, that cotton towels take forever to dry. Sometimes it feels like you should have a clothes dryer in your bathroom. These towels are all polyester fiber so no cotton, also called microfiber.I like the color and design of these towels. The stripes are a nice departure from the same old solid colors you usually find in the bathroom. I like the way they are made, they have a nice hem around the edge and they even include a small hanging loop on the edge of the hem so that you can hang the towel on a hook without worrying about it falling on the floor. Instead of the fabric just being a flat tight weave like most bath/beach towels the fabric in these towels is more fluffy. Close up it almost sort of reminds me of the weave of a shaggy carpet. That profile in the fabric makes these towels a lot more absorbent than some other flat-weave synthetic towels I own. I don't like feeling as if I just wiped myself off with a piece of plastic that didn't absorb any of the water that was on me. They have avoided that with these towels and I'm pretty impressed with that. The large towels are very big. They feel huge compared to the other full-size bath towels we have, but that's fine. They're certainly a great size for the pool or beach so that's a plus. I guess the number one thing about these towels is that because they are synthetic they really do dry out a lot faster, in the dryer and just hanging there. Anyone who has reached for their towel in the shower or at the pool only to discover that it is mostly damp will appreciate that.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super buy', 'author': 'Jessie Z.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am attracted by the color. I am buying more!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and good', 'author': 'Sara', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Exactly what I needed! I just wish the product will include 3 big towels instead 1 big and 2 small.2 small are really small!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars These towels are way too soft!', 'author': 'Russell Rice', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'So, my expectations for towels are: - They need to dry me - They need to not fall apart.Let me tell you people, these towels have SURPASSED all expectations I had for towels that I purchase touch-unfelt.My previous towels were the wonderful Mainstays brand from your local brick-and-mortar big-box store (it\'s a store brand, you can figure it out). They lasted ten years, and still do the job of drying me, however, they\'re starting to fall apart (expected after ten years).I saw the deal for these towels. I had reservations, but they were in my favorite configuration numbers (matching numbers of bath towels, hand towels, and wash cloths), and a reasonable price. What\'s the worst that could happen, they have the same lasting impression as what I bought ten years ago?They arrived promptly (I\'m still upset at the USPS guy ringing my doorbell at 6:47am, but that\'s no fault of these towels, except for the fact they were in the delivery). I opened the box to a pretty cool wrapped combo of the towels. I opened the first set and immediately said "WOWSERS!" Touching them was like touching the fur of a 6 week old bunny. It was impossible to not hold it up against my cheek and try to snuggle with it. I did the rule of washing them. There was the standard "first wash" lint, but it was less than I expected, considering the softness. And, the wash just made them softer.Their softness and absorbance is also their downfall. Using the wash cloth, I don\'t get what feels to be an abrasive exfoliation like my previous cloths gave. It\'s a lushness spreads any cleanser you use through your skin without the possibility of leaving a scratch on even the fairest of skins.When drying off, the towels absorb any excess shower water almost as instantly as the Sham-Wow guy demonstrates his product. The water is grasped into its fibers and locked away to be evaporated into the air.In all, these towels deserve 6 out of 5 stars. But, Amazon is rude and won\'t let me go that high.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 13, 2018', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not very thick', 'author': 'Stephanie Franklin', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Was excited to order these towels as a gift since the price was so great. title: Set of 6 Spring Bathroom Towel Set Includes 2 Bath Towels 2 Hand Towels 2 Washcloths, Soft Absorbent Hand Towels Decorative Guest Towel Bathroom Towel Set, 3 Sizes
reviews: [{'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not As Expected', 'author': 'Jeri', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'These are pretty but not typical toweling material; i.e., not terrycloth. More like flat microfiber cleaning or dusting cloths. I will keep them because I mostly wanted them for decoration in my “butterfly bathroom,” but if you order, don’t expect big fluffy towels.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Thin but soft', 'author': 'Rio', 'rating': 3, 'content': "So, I would almost refer to these more as bath sheets. They are very thin, but they are very soft. They stretch a little. They all held up well in the washer and dryer. The washcloths are very comfy to use, but again, very soft so you won't get any exfoliation with them. The bath towels (or sheets) are large and cover a good area, but they stick to you when you try to dry off and you can't really rub yourself down with them. You almost have to pat dry instead of rubbing dry. It's literally like if you were trying to dry yourself off with a sheet. It's so awkward. And soft. The towel does an amazing job of wrapping your hair, though, and it stays wrapped and does not fall off your head, so if you're going to use it for anything, I suggest using it for that. These would also make great towels to take out to the beach and lie on or something, but I just don't know they are the best to towel off with after a shower. In the end, love how soft they are, probably a bit too thin, stick to your skin when you're trying to dry off. Just meh, but could be great if used for the right job.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': False}]

Have you ever ordered from wish? If so, this would be a product you would expect from there lol! If you're looking for a plush set like this picture shows, this is definitely not the set for you. If you're looking for a super thin light weight towel for a 3 year old, then this would work great.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 19, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great value', 'author': 'richard gallehr', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Best performance and price', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Soft', 'author': 'Pf', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'Too soft for me gave as a gift', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Well made and incredibly absorbent microfiber towels', 'author': 'Jojoleb', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The Exclusivo Mezcala 4-Piect Ultra Soft Bath Towel set is a fine set of micorfiber towels.The set includes two bath towels and two hand towels. The towels are soft and plush and are indeed quite absorbent. The towels have a nice pile that is super absorbent and will dry you completely. They wash easily and wash well, retaining their shape and absorbency. The colors are rich and remained unchanged after two washes.They have that microfiber feel, which is perfectly fine but definitely different from what you might expect if you have only used cotton terry cloth towels. Whereas terry cloth glides over your skin, these seem to have just a bit more friction. That said, they are still softer than the average cotton towel and are more absorbent. They are also lighter in weight and dry more quickly on the rack.For the record, not all microfiber towels are the same. These are far more absorbent than my last set of towels. They appear to be well made. As with most microfiber towels, there is a sewn border around the periphery of the towels. These appear to be well seated and should last a long time. Each towel has a built in loop for hanging, which is convenient.I was pleased with these towels and actually prefer them to standard, bath towels. Recommended.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2023', 'is_verified': False}]

title: Superior Egyptian Cotton 6-Piece Towel Set, Bathroom Essentials, Towels for Bathroom, Apartment, Airbnb, Guest Bath, Face, Hand, Bath Towels, Washcloths, Absorbent, Fast Drying, Toast
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Egyptian cotton', 'author': 'DrMaat', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Goes great with purple rugs. Brings out a Royal feeling. Soft. Nice color.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So amazing!', 'author': 'Jessy', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I bought this towel to due to my other one being ruined, and I honestly do not regret it!! It has made such a difference!! It is big, soft, and you can hang it up and it’s so easy to store!! I highly recommend buying this towel!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Black Towels -- They do shrink', 'author': 'A Mom with Kids and Fur Kids', 'rating': 4, 'content': "UPDATED October 2015------------------------------------I purchased 2 sets of these wash cloths. One set in black and another in the brown-Mocha.The BLACK washcloths still look fine. We use one of them nearly every day and they are still soft and there aren't any threads or problems with them.The MOCHA washclothes are still useful but have faded and aren't as soft. I do use them in the kitchen though for washing dishes whereas the Black are used on us.I'm about to order another set and while brown would be preferable, I will be buying more Black.==============================================================I was divided as to whether get these 'face' towels or some others that were cheaper, and I'm glad I got these.Others might use them as face towels but what I wanted were washcloths for the kitchen. These are going to work fine.WHAT YOU MIGHT WANT TO KNOWThese towels did NOT fade in the wash; nor they need a color grabber sheet in the laundry. They didn't 'leak' dye.These little towels are plush and have a decorative band on each end.They are also bound on all four sides.They shrunk in the wash. What came out of the dryer was 11.5 x 11.5 inches... slightly wider at the center.These are nice black washcloths/face towels for the money.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 10, 2014', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbent and Soft', 'author': 'SUSAN M. DRAKE', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I have purchased numerous sets of towels that were pretty and soft but they didn't absorb very well. These towels are plush and absorb all the water after showering. They're pretty and they are washing really well. I'm loving them! I have found Egyptian cotton made in India is the best. These are still made in India!!! Get them while you can. They do run out of stock quickly as people are discovering these towels beat most high end department store cotton towels.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice', 'author': 'Susan', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I ordered these in burgandy, washed them with two cups of white vinegar added to the detergent and wash water in the tub, then added the towels, and put them through a normal cycle with a bit of fabric softener. They came out fluffy and absorbent. Today's towels are treated to resist insects and stains in the manufacturing/shipping process, so it's important to remove that protective coating from the fabric before using, and a regular wash just won't do it. Sheets also have this coating. For me, it irritates the skin, so I wash everything new in this manner. It also helps to set the color.The towels are of good quality and a nice thickness. Wash cloths are generously sized. I like them a great deal and will order more. When you consider the price of a similar towel at a major department store, these are a bargain. At Macy's, I priced similar wash cloths this weekend at a sale price of $6.34 per cloth. It seems that there are some discrepancies in the quality of different colors of these towels, so you might want to read through the reviews for the particular color before purchasing. I'm very satisfied with this purchase...very nice for the price.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 16, 2013', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft', 'author': 'animekat', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Excellent quality and soft material. Perfect small face towels.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and absorbent towels, BUT non stop shedding', 'author': 'christina castillo', 'rating': 3, 'content': "I've washed and dried these towels 11 times and still my dryer vent is FULL of lint from the towels. They are thin. Not as bad as motel towels, but close. They do seem to be made well, the color was spot on, and the measurements were true... but they are not the same quality as the original towels I got years ago. The reason for the decent rating? Climate change is REAL people! Which means my house is a million times more humid than it ever was before. Consequently, thick towels never dry and always smell like mildew, even when clean. These guys are thin enough that they air dry well, so no dampness or mildew smell. I guess I'm changing my expectations along with time changing things (like the damn weather). Overall, for the price I think these towels are a good deal. If you're not looking for plush, thick towels, but ones that get the job done and are wellmade, I think these will do. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Egyptian cotton', 'author': 'DrMaat', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Goes great with purple rugs. Brings out a Royal feeling. Soft. I highly recommend buying this towel!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Black Towels -- They do shrink', 'author': 'A Mom with Kids and Fur Kids', 'rating': 4, 'content': "UPDATED October 2015------------------------------------I purchased 2 sets of these wash cloths. One set in black and another in the brown-Mocha.The BLACK washcloths still look fine. We use one of them nearly every day and they are still soft and there aren't any threads or problems with them.The MOCHA washclothes are still useful but have faded and aren't as soft. I do use them in the kitchen though for washing dishes whereas the Black are used on us.I'm about to order another set and while brown would be preferable, I will be buying more Black.==============================================================I was divided as to whether get these 'face' towels or some others that were cheaper, and I'm glad I got these.Others might use them as face towels but what I wanted were washcloths for the kitchen. These are going to work fine.WHAT YOU MIGHT WANT TO KNOWThese towels did NOT fade in the wash; nor they need a color grabber sheet in the laundry. They didn't 'leak' dye.These little towels are plush and have a decorative band on each end.They are also bound on all four sides.They shrunk in the wash. What came out of the dryer was 11.5 x 11.5 inches... slightly wider at the center.These are nice black washcloths/face towels for the money.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 10, 2014', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbent and Soft', 'author': 'SUSAN M. DRAKE', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I have purchased numerous sets of towels that were pretty and soft but they didn't absorb very well. These towels are plush and absorb all the water after showering. They're pretty and they are washing really well. I'm loving them! I have found Egyptian cotton made in India is the best. These are still made in India!!! Get them while you can. They do run out of stock quickly as people are discovering these towels beat most high end department store cotton towels.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice', 'author': 'Susan', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I ordered these in burgandy, washed them with two cups of white vinegar added to the detergent and wash water in the tub, then added the towels, and put them through a normal cycle with a bit of fabric softener. They came out fluffy and absorbent. Today's towels are treated to resist insects and stains in the manufacturing/shipping process, so it's important to remove that protective coating from the fabric before using, and a regular wash just won't do it. Sheets also have this coating. For me, it irritates the skin, so I wash everything new in this manner. It also helps to set the color.The towels are of good quality and a nice thickness. Wash cloths are generously sized. I like them a great deal and will order more. When you consider the price of a similar towel at a major department store, these are a bargain. At Macy's, I priced similar wash cloths this weekend at a sale price of $6.34 per cloth. It seems that there are some discrepancies in the quality of different colors of these towels, so you might want to read through the reviews for the particular color before purchasing. I'm very satisfied with this purchase...very nice for the price.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 16, 2013', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft', 'author': 'animekat', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Excellent quality and soft material. The towels came wrapped in plastic and did not smell coming out of the bag. They were tied together with a nice wide ribbon - slight drawback is the ribbon was branded but it was wide and was still nicely tied and presented. I washed them in cold water and dried them on medium heat in the dryer. As with most new towels, they did shed quite a bit of lint but they looked nice and were soft coming out of the dryer. There were some stray threads but otherwise seemed to be a good quality towel (tags note 100% cotton) - time will tell after multiple "use cycles". The measurements on my set are as follows (approximate): bath: 52"x25", hand: 27"x16", and face: 12"x12". As other reviewers have noted, the bath towel is not a "sheet" rather it is the more standard bath towel size. I\'m glad that this set didn\'t come with more than 2 face cloth/towels - I find that many people don\'t really use them and so they end up stored in the linen closet. For this set though, it is very nice for a guest bath, gifting or otherwise. Pricing for towels vary widely based on quality of the material, thickness, absorbency, size and other factors so it is hard to compare but the current price of this set is $31.99 seems a little high to me given it is only 6 pieces. It would be much more useful / giftable with the inclusion of 2 more hand towels (making it an 8 piece set) for the same price. Brenneisen', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Really nice thickness, absorbent and true red color.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted!', 'author': 'Patricia S. Hulon', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The color was perfect match for my needs', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Skip these!', 'author': 'M Robyn Butterfield', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'I read tons of reviews before I buy anything and this was no exception. I needed a bunch of good towels for a wedding we were hosting at our house because at least 15 people were staying with us for several days before the event. There are many towel options on Amazon but these seemed to be a very good mix of price, fast delivery and positive reviews. They looked great when they arrived but that’s where the good news ended. I read the care instructions and followed them to the letter when washing them upon arrival. When they came out of the wash they looked like they’d been to war. Strings, snags, unraveling pieces. They looked so much worse than my old towels. I bought several different colors so I washed them all in hopes it was just one faulty bunch but they all came out looking horrible. I had read in the reviews that the amount of lint was incredible and that was no exaggeration. There was so much lint that it was blowing out of my filter. But I knew that going in so I wasn’t particularly bothered. I contacted customer service and had to answer quite a few questions as well as send pictures of the damages. They offered me two options. 1. Pack all of the towels up and mail them back for a full refund or 2. Skip sending them back and get a 50% refund. In the end, I chose to take the 50% refund because I had already thrown out all of the packaging (mass cleaning for the wedding) and it would have been an enormous pain to pack it all up and mail them back because it was over $300 worth of towels. I’m guessing they know this and that’s why they offer the 50% because they still get half your money for their bad product. I would not buy these again and if you are wanting decent towels I would keep looking. I’m attaching a few pictures where I focused on a particular issue but it was hard to capture the full extent of how unraveled they were. Imagine these strings coming from all over the towels and you’ll have a good idea.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color and very soft', 'author': 'BIG RED', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We use this product for a Christmas display in one of our bathrooms as long with some Christmas themed pictures in pink and a set of rugs makes the entire room very Christmassy and beautiful', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Customers are happy', 'author': 'Doost', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The towels do work fine', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 18, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Decent quality towel', 'author': 'Carissa Brooks', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Towels look great but after a few washes they start to pill. I just wish the product will include 3 big towels instead 1 big and 2 small.2 small are really small!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars These towels are way too soft!', 'author': 'Russell Rice', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'So, my expectations for towels are: - They need to dry me - They need to not fall apart.Let me tell you people, these towels have SURPASSED all expectations I had for towels that I purchase touch-unfelt.My previous towels were the wonderful Mainstays brand from your local brick-and-mortar big-box store (it\'s a store brand, you can figure it out). They lasted ten years, and still do the job of drying me, however, they\'re starting to fall apart (expected after ten years).I saw the deal for these towels. I had reservations, but they were in my favorite configuration numbers (matching numbers of bath towels, hand towels, and wash cloths), and a reasonable price. What\'s the worst that could happen, they have the same lasting impression as what I bought ten years ago?They arrived promptly (I\'m still upset at the USPS guy ringing my doorbell at 6:47am, but that\'s no fault of these towels, except for the fact they were in the delivery). I opened the box to a pretty cool wrapped combo of the towels. I opened the first set and immediately said "WOWSERS!" Touching them was like touching the fur of a 6 week old bunny. It was impossible to not hold it up against my cheek and try to snuggle with it. I did the rule of washing them. There was the standard "first wash" lint, but it was less than I expected, considering the softness. And, the wash just made them softer.Their softness and absorbance is also their downfall. Using the wash cloth, I don\'t get what feels to be an abrasive exfoliation like my previous cloths gave. It\'s a lushness spreads any cleanser you use through your skin without the possibility of leaving a scratch on even the fairest of skins.When drying off, the towels absorb any excess shower water almost as instantly as the Sham-Wow guy demonstrates his product. The water is grasped into its fibers and locked away to be evaporated into the air.In all, these towels deserve 6 out of 5 stars. But, Amazon is rude and won\'t let me go that high.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 13, 2018', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not very thick', 'author': 'Stephanie Franklin', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Was excited to order these towels as a gift since the price was so great. Dries quickly and keeps the water in the shower. I would recommend this product for anyone going for that beach theme look.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 30, 2019', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Shower Curtain With A Bit Too Much Bling', 'author': 'Alex', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This is a gorgeous shower curtain, but not quite as described. It does not repel water. It is very good at absorbing water. There are lots of sequins/beads sewn on most of the starfish. Two of the upper starfish have a single strand of elongated, gold beads. All the middle starfish have opaque blue sequins. Mine were nearly completely blocked out by all the sequins, except for one (it was a tad "bald"). Two of the bottom starfish have transparent sequins. If your lightsource is from the side, you\'ll get plenty of sparkle. If your lightsource is directly above, you\'ll get virtually no sparkle. That is the case with me, so I\'m removing the opaque, blue sequins because they just look like dark blue dots—not very appealing. If you\'re going to remove any sequins, I\'d suggest using a cuticle nipper. Otherwise, there is a real good chance of ruining the shower curtain. One reviewer said the fabric looks like burlap. That is not accurate. It looks more like a loosely-woven linen with the addition of a soft luster. The fabric is midweight. I would never wash this in a machine. The sequins will withstand the washer because they are sewn on individually with a thread that resembles fishing line. The beads are sewn on with cotton thread. If that thread breaks, the whole strand of beads will come off and go down the drain because they are not individually sewn on.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 28, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of maintenance', 'author': 'lourock', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Looks good,just gotta constantly wash and vacuum.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Mixweer 10 Pieces Bath Towel Set, Microfiber Coral Velvet Highly Absorbent Towels Bathroom Towels for Body Shower Beach Travel, 28 x 55 Inches (Multicolor)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and very absorbent!', 'author': 'Kaitlyn Saldate', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Excellent value for so many towels! These are super absorbent and I love how soft they are. It feels like you’re drying off with a snuggly blanket. They feel more luxurious to me than regular towels. They roll up nice and slim and are great for packing. The minky type texture of the fabric is also much more durable and stain resistant than regular cotton towels. I love the little loops that make hanging on hooks easier and I don’t have to worry about my kids pulling them down off the hooks when they dry their hands. I am very picky about the temperature i wash and dry my stuff and separate my laundry by fabric content. Since these are synthetic fiber like much of my laundry, they wash and dry easily with my other synthetic clothes at low temperatures. I used to get so mad when someone threw towels in with the laundry since cotton towels take FOREVER to dry and by then all my delicate synthetic clothes get over dry, wear out faster, and get all staticky. These dry so much faster and on medium or low heat too. I will say, some people don’t like the feel of them. My husband doesn’t like them and prefers to use thicker feeling traditional towels. Either you love them or you don’t.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 13, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money', 'author': 'Nurit Amit', 'rating': 1, 'content': "When I received the towels I saw for the first time towels almost as thin as paper. title: Ben Kaufman Cabana Stripe Beach & Pool Towel - Large Cotton Terry Beach Towel - Soft & Absorbant - Assorted Colors - 30" x 60" - 6 Pack
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Thin, absorbent and easy dry', 'author': "Chloe's Mom", 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I use these in my Vrbo property for guest. Inexpensive, bright and cheery colors, absorbent and quick to launder and dry. Not a high quality towel but suits my needs well. Towels disappear at a rental property so I just order a new bundle when I start getting low on them.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 6, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great towels!', 'author': 'Sheryl', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Lots of fun colors and great use!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Fuzzy!', 'author': 'Robin Woolard', 'rating': 4, 'content': "When I opened the package, I noticed there was a lot of lint, loose threads, and even hair all over these towels. Threw them straight into the washer, then into the dryer, and they came out with more loose threads & a *lot* more lint/fuzz. They still work, and the colors are bright & beautiful, they'll just need de-fuzzing until they get broken in a little.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 7, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific value!!!', 'author': 'SuzieQ.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Our family bought a selection of Ben Kaufman towels last summer and were happy with them. This year, at our summer vacation destination, the rental company is charging $6 per day per beach towel?! My sisters and I decided that it was much, much more cost effective to buy beach towels to take on vacation. So, we purchased these from Amazon. The colors are bright; size is good; weight is good; and they dry quickly!! So, for about $70 for a dozen and doing a little extra laundry -- we'll save over $400 on beach towel rentals!!! And, we can bring them back again next year! Just be aware that after first washing, they give off a lot of lint, so empty the lint screen half way through dry time :)", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 15, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Absorb well and dry quickly', 'author': 'Jonathan S Hauerwas', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These are thin, scratchy towels, but they are what I reach for when heading to the pool. The plush soft towels I have are a pain to wash and dry daily and if I wasn't the person responsible for doing the laundry I might prefer the plush soft towels, but I do the laundry and I'm conscientious of the wastefulness of running the dryer for hours to dry thick towels. The colors on these towels are great. I will 100% buy them again when I need to replace pool towels.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Decent.', 'author': 'Taylor', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'These towels are pretty average. I washed them on cold and low dry to avoid fading - the colors maintained pretty well but the amount of lint that came off of them was insane. They are thinner than I was hoping for based on the description.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect towels for the pool', 'author': 'Lady Stardust 1980', 'rating': 5, 'content': "We just put in a pool and I wanted extra towels to keep handy for guests. These towels are large enough to wrap around your body and soft enough that you don't mind them against your skin. They are exactly what I wanted and you can't beat the price. I saw a lot of negative reviews for these towels and I think those people had unreasonable expectations. If you are expecting velvety soft, plush, bath towels, you will be disappointed. If you just need extra towels for drying off after a dip in the pool, you'll love these. We have been using these for months and I have noticed no issues with fraying or color bleeding. One towel was left on the deck and did experience a bit of sun bleaching, but that was entirely due to user error. I dig these so much, I will probably end up buying another set.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 12, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap quality', 'author': 'MEL', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'Not nearly as vibrant as photos in ad. Do not buy. Much better options out there - not worth paying any amount for these as beach/pool towels', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars They pick some small people for their pictures.', 'author': 'R. title: Oliven 4 Piece Brown Cabana Stripe Washcloths Set 13"x13" Soft Highly Absorbent Quick Dry Bathroom Towels Microfiber Plush Towels Set Woven Towels for Kitchen Hotel Spa Gym
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Nice Towels!', 'author': 'LZ', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These are pretty nice. Need wash it first, because there is LOTS of lint!! After that, they are very absorbant and soft and the right amount of thick. You know how some towels say "cotton" but they don\'t absorb, they just kinda spread the water around? These don\'t do that! They\'re actually really good! Much better than my last bath towel purchase from Amazon.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Huge towels with nice fuzzy feel that actually dry out in a reasonable amount of time', 'author': 'Jeff Warner', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I got these towels as a compliment to the bathroom we are redoing. I usually prefer towels that are predominately cotton or with a high percentage of cotton I think just because that's what I've always been used to. The problem is, that cotton towels take forever to dry. Sometimes it feels like you should have a clothes dryer in your bathroom. These towels are all polyester fiber so no cotton, also called microfiber.I like the color and design of these towels. The stripes are a nice departure from the same old solid colors you usually find in the bathroom. I like the way they are made, they have a nice hem around the edge and they even include a small hanging loop on the edge of the hem so that you can hang the towel on a hook without worrying about it falling on the floor. Instead of the fabric just being a flat tight weave like most bath/beach towels the fabric in these towels is more fluffy. Close up it almost sort of reminds me of the weave of a shaggy carpet. That profile in the fabric makes these towels a lot more absorbent than some other flat-weave synthetic towels I own. I don't like feeling as if I just wiped myself off with a piece of plastic that didn't absorb any of the water that was on me. They have avoided that with these towels and I'm pretty impressed with that. The large towels are very big. They feel huge compared to the other full-size bath towels we have, but that's fine. They're certainly a great size for the pool or beach so that's a plus. I guess the number one thing about these towels is that because they are synthetic they really do dry out a lot faster, in the dryer and just hanging there. Anyone who has reached for their towel in the shower or at the pool only to discover that it is mostly damp will appreciate that.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super buy', 'author': 'Jessie Z.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am attracted by the color. After I got it, I am very satisfied with it! The quality is very good. It feels soft.It comes with different sizes. It is perfect for family use. I will definitely buy it again. Would like to recommend to everyone!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super absorbing', 'author': 'Ashley Riggs', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These are the best towels I've ever used. title: Sophie & Panda Fuzzy Ball Towel (Set of 2) Creamy and Brown - Dry Your Hand Instantly conveniently with This Creative Bath Towel Set Decorative Towels for Bathroom (Pack of 2)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Multipurpose', 'author': 'Mel S', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Based on over 3 months of use:(+) Effective: better than a towel. These work really well to dry hands quickly, including between fingers. Just squeeze and go. No towel fumbling required.(+) Space saving: no towel bar or counter stand required. Small size allows greater flexibility in where you place them- including within better reach for kids.(+) Quality: the colors are nice and are as they appear digitally; I bought brown and cream and grey and white. Super soft and well-made. They’ve held up after ~ 5 washings this far.(++) Multipurpose: work well to soak up water quickly and easily behind and on faucet and knobs, in car door jams after a wash. They are the perfect size to hold, they get in grooves nicely.(+) I liked mine so much I bought a pair as a gift.I wash them in a lingerie bag in delicate wash cycle; they take 24-36 hrs to completely air dry.Be careful about gemstone rings: in first use verify your rings don’t get caught in the fibers.The hedgehog version looks very cute and I’m tempted to buy a pair to add some whimsy to a mundane task. Owls might make for an equally cute option.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice', 'author': 'Victoria Eichler', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Much better than towels because they dry. The absorbency of the fibers is high enough that his hands get dried quickly. I change them out every couple of days and they wash and dry nicely. For adult sized hands, they weren't nearly as effective in drying off the hands. I went back to a traditional handtowel on the towel bar, with this hanging on the bar for the little ones and all was well.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Works great!', 'author': 'Mary', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I bought a two pack of these, because my kitchen counter is quite long, and often I need to just quickly dry my fingers, but the dish towel is out of reach at the other end of the counter. These little hand dryers seem to be made of a puffy sponge inside the microfiber chenille. at first, I didn’t think they were big enough to do the job, but they actually do. They are a little bit on the small side, even for my small hands, but they do actually dry them quite well. They seemed too thick, too easily dry between my fingers, but they are very squashable, so it hasn’t been a problem. if I would make any change, I would ask that they be maybe an inch bigger across. But overall, I’m very happy with these, and will be getting more, both for myself, and to give as gifts.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Bought for frequent hand washer', 'author': 'SM', 'rating': 4, 'content': "My husband washes his hands 1000x when cooking and I was tired of soggy kitchen towels so I bought these. He says the absorbency is great, but they don't dry out as quickly as he'd like when using them a lot. At least it leaves the kitchen towel dry for others in the house to use. They are very soft and wash easily with other towels.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

If you're looking for a super thin light weight towel for a 3 year old, then this would work great.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 19, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great value', 'author': 'richard gallehr', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Best performance and price', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Soft', 'author': 'Pf', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'Too soft for me gave as a gift', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Well made and incredibly absorbent microfiber towels', 'author': 'Jojoleb', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The Exclusivo Mezcala 4-Piect Ultra Soft Bath Towel set is a fine set of micorfiber towels.The set includes two bath towels and two hand towels. The towels are soft and plush and are indeed quite absorbent. The towels have a nice pile that is super absorbent and will dry you completely. They wash easily and wash well, retaining their shape and absorbency. The colors are rich and remained unchanged after two washes.They have that microfiber feel, which is perfectly fine but definitely different from what you might expect if you have only used cotton terry cloth towels. Whereas terry cloth glides over your skin, these seem to have just a bit more friction. That said, they are still softer than the average cotton towel and are more absorbent. They are also lighter in weight and dry more quickly on the rack.For the record, not all microfiber towels are the same. These are far more absorbent than my last set of towels. They appear to be well made. As with most microfiber towels, there is a sewn border around the periphery of the towels. These appear to be well seated and should last a long time. Each towel has a built in loop for hanging, which is convenient.I was pleased with these towels and actually prefer them to standard, bath towels. Recommended.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2023', 'is_verified': False}]

title: 630 GSM Ultra Soft 6 Piece Mix Towel Set, High Absorbent 100% Turkish Cotton, 2 Bath, 2 Hand, 2 Wash, Ideal for Gym, Spa, Hotel and Outdoor, Bright White & Dark Grey Mix Set
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Good Quality', 'author': 'Amy', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very nice set, great value. Hand towels and wash cloths are standard size, bath towels are bigger than standard. Very good absorption and nice and soft.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good Towels - Standard Quality', 'author': 'LeslieD', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I own some high thread count towels and these are not extremely high quality and feel the use of the word "premium" is a little overstated in the description. They\'re a bit softer than those you get at the large superstores, but I have trouble believing they\'re truly Turkish cotton, which is typically tightly woven and not as "fluffy" as these towels. They are fairly lightweight for the fluff you get, so I am hopeful. They are well made with straight, double-stitched edges, not warped or curled and the absorbency is good. They\'re, in my opinion, just basic towels though, and not quite what I had hoped for in my guest bath. I suppose the real test will come after several washings to see whether the threads hold and will update if there are issues. My biggest problem is that where they say "bright white", they are not. They have a definite yellow tint to them, as you can see from the photo where I placed a piece of bright white paper on it. The other off-putting this is that they had a scent added that made them smell like fabric softener. I guess that\'s better than a weird chemical smell, but a scent added to new towels just made me think that it was perhaps covering a less pleasant odor and was a bit strange on new towels. I will most likely just end up using these for daily use instead of the truly white luxury towels I had hoped for in my guest bath. The quality/value ratio is fine for this level, and perhaps I expected more than I should have based on description instead of that ratio.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love these towels', 'author': 'WizardsOfAmazon (FB)', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These Turkish cotton towels are heavenly! Luxuriously plush with supreme absorbency, they wrap you in spa-like comfort. The 6-piece set covers all needs and occasions, from home to gym or spa. Quick-drying and OEKO-TEX certified, ensuring safety and indulgence for the whole family. Bath time just got a luxurious upgrade! 🛁✨ #LuxuryComfort', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars We love these', 'author': 'Tesse', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I probably should have gotten black so that things like makeup and hair color don\'t show, but my bathroon was begging for a pop of color. 😄 We\'ve been using these and they\'ve been washed a couple of times, and we really like them. They\'re soft and absorbent. The bath towels are 52"x26", the hand towels 27"x15" and the washcloths 13.5"x11". I did the math and calculated the GSM (they claim 630). The hand towels and the washcloths were around 600 GSM. The bath towels were well over--667 GSM and 673 GSM. Above 700 is considered premium, so these are very close. Above 700 they can start to get thicker and unwieldy, like spa towels. Low GSMs (300-400) is where you\'ll find the "quick-dry" towels. They dry quickly because they aren\'t absorbent. I learned my lesson there long ago... It\'s also my understanding that Turkish cotton becomes softer and more absorbent the more it\'s used, so I hope we\'ll be using these for a long time.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 6, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Machine wash before using', 'author': 'Liz', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Got this set for my master bathroom for a nice change of color. The set includes 2 bath towels, 2 hand towels and 2 washcloths. The color is even throughout the towels and they are all stitched well. The towels are quite soft but need to be machine washed and dried before using, otherwise they will leave lint on your hands and body. After machine washing and drying, the towels did shrink up a bit but were also fluffier. In the pics, I compared the washcloth before and after washing and drying to show the amount of shrinkage and fluffiness. Compared to my old towels, these new towels are nice and thick (see pic). This is a fine set of towels that deserve 5 stars!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 6, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Okay, but not particularly luxurious', 'author': 'Thomas B. Gross', 'rating': 4, 'content': "These are slightly thinner and actually a bit slicker than the towels I am accustomed to. It's possible that with repeated washing with fabric softener they might feel a bit more absorbent, but right out of the box they are, I hate to say it, not really as luxurious as the towels you might get at a gym, which tend to be a bit rougher, in a good way.If you've ever had to dry yourself off after a shower using paper towels you know how much easier it is to use a good terry cloth towel. This is NOT to say that these towels are as ineffective as paper towels, but on a scale of 1 to 10, where 1 is a paper towel and 10 is a high-end, thick, luxurious terry cloth towel, these are like a 6 or 7. I will continue to use them however.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 23, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value / High Quality Towel Set', 'author': 'Jelane', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These towels are soft and absorbent and wash/dry well. I love the dark gray color. If you're looking for a towel set for a guest bathroom or to update your own bathroom, look no further. This set will work well and is priced very reasonably for the quality you get.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars These are SO nice', 'author': 'Daisy', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These are nice and thick, super fluffy, don't die or fade or pill in the washer or dryer, and feel awesome right after a shower :)", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 6, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars GSM', 'author': 'Andrew P. Peralta', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'These towels did not feel like my other 600 gsm towels. They were thin and light. 600 gsm are thick and somewhat heavy.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Not absorbant', 'author': 'D P', 'rating': 1, 'content': "These are the worst towels I've ever purchased. Bought the chocolate brown ones to contrast with my beige tile and walls in my primary bathroom. I would place a bet that these are NOT cotton. They do not absorb moisture. Also, after 2 machine washes and dries they are shedding terribly. Brown fuzz all over my shower and floor. I don't know how these got such good reviews. Buyer beware!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]
