title: White Bath Towels Set, 2 Oversized Large Towels/2 Hand Towels/4 Washcloths,600 GSM Towels Bathroom Sets, Quick Dry Towel Super Soft Absorbent Shower Towels Set Hotel Spa Towel (8 Pack)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft, large size, great quality. Absorb water well.', 'author': 'Mia G.', 'rating': 5, 'content': '• Style and version:-Style: Bath Towels Set of 6-Color: Navy (The navy isn\'t a true navy blue, it\'s more of a mid toned blue, the pictures in the listing that show it more as mid-toned blue for the navy are are accurate in color.)•Overall Impression:-This is a great set of over sized bath towels. They are very soft, high quality, large sized and absorb water very well. It’s a good value for the quality and how many towels are included in the set.-Just understand, that these are not standard cotton towels. They won\'t look and feel quite like cotton (or cotton blends) on the skin. Not everyone will like the difference, it may take some getting used to. Once I was used to the difference, I actually prefer these to standard cotton towels.-These are synthetic, microfiber towels. They aren\'t cotton or a cotton blend. They are made of 100% polyester. In older style towels, that might not be a good thing for the feel and performance. In these, it\'s actually a plus and a good thing. If you\'re thinking that they\'re cheap feeling due to this, they\'re not.-They aren\'t like a cotton loop towel. Nor are the like velvety synthetic or blended towels. They\'re closest to a soft faux fur blanket in texture. Not overly thick like a blanket, they\'re mid-weight thickness (not too thin or thick). This also isn\'t quite like a thin, rough microfiber cleaning towel or cloth, these are a lot fluffier, thicker and softer than those.-They do absorb water very well. I was worried they would be like standard microfiber cleaning cloths that don\'t seem to absorb well, but they are nothing like that. The pull the water away from you more than wipe it off, if that makes sense. So it will feel different during drying off than a normal towel. I found I got just as dry, just as quickly with these towels as a standard cotton bath towel.-The textured pattern isn\'t as deep in the towel in person as it is in the pictures. After washing it fluffs up and looks more like a standard towel vs a patterned or textured towel. It\'s there but less noticible. If you were wanting towels that are more quilted in a pattern or textured, these don\'t quite look that way in person. They do at first, but not after washing them.-The tag on them says to wash in cold water. I always wash my towels in hot water (standard washer, top vs front loader). So I did wash these in hot water with my normal laundry soap. I had no issues with shrinkage, dye running (even when washed with lighter washcloths that were cotton). (I would suggest the first wash be by themselves just to be safe.)-I was impressed that even on the first wash and dry, there was almost no lint in my dryer from them. They don\'t shed fiber or lint during use or in the dryer. When I trialed one (then later all of them) in a laundry load with my older standard cotton towels, washcloths, hand-towels I was also impressed.-I didn\'t have issues with lint or shedding on the microfiber towels. I get quite a bit of laundry dryer lint with my cotton towels in the lint screen, but none stuck to the microfiber towels. They took about 5 minutes longer to dry on high heat than my cotton towels do. You may have to slightly adjust your dryer time if it\'s not on an auto setting.-I ended up liking these so much, I replaced my worn out cotton towels with these and plan to get more. My husband was skeptical he would like these (he dislikes microfiber in general), and he loved them too and we both think they are the softest, best towels we’ve used or had. We both prefer them to traditional cotton towels and are switching to this style as our old cotton towels needed replacing.-There are matching hand-towels and washcloths in this fabric, brand and style but I haven\'t tried those yet. But they are available if you want or need them.-One big plus these towels have is the edge stitching vs standard cotton towels, it\'s edging vs just a folded towel. I have issues with my standard cotton towels (even more pricey ones that are good quality) eventually wearing out on the edges and the edges pulling off and leaving strings and threads on the edges. I don\'t think these will do that, due to the microfiber and how well the edges are stitched with actual edging material.• What’s Included:-Note: There are several variations in this listing.-6 bath towels (in this variation)• Size:-Large, over-sized.-Bath sheet style.-55" inches long-27" inches wide.• Pros-what I liked and what worked well:-Very, very soft like a faux-fur blanket in feel. Mid-weight, not too thin or thick.-Absorb water well and dry well.-Microfiber, synthetic material (100% polyester) that\'s high quality and should hold up very well.-Hanging loop on the side to hang them up.-Good edge stitching with actual edging material. The edges should hold up very well.-Lightly textured pattern (but in person after washing, it\'s not noticible, they just look fluffy).-Wash very well even on hot water. No issues with shrinking or fabric dye running. (The tags do say cold water though.)-Dry very well in a dryer on high heat. Produce very little lint, don\'t shed. They don’t come out wrinkled at all out of the dryer.-Easy to fold and fold well without creases and wrinkling. They take up less space than thicker cotton towels for the amount of towels in the area.-There are coordinating hand towels and washcloths in the color and product line. (May not be included in every variation, they weren\'t in mine.)-The navy color isn\'t a dark navy but more of a mid toned blue, it was really pretty in the bathroom with the shower curtain.-Large, over-sized bath sheet size. They wrap around you very well.-Have no unpleasant scent to them.-Microfiber causes less frizz on the hair than cotton towels.• Cons-what I didn’t like and what didn’t work well:-No issues.• Tips & Thoughts:-I would suggest not using fabric softener with these towels (liquid or dryer sheet). I did not and stopped doing that long ago. I found that towels perform better if no fabric softener is ever used.-I did wash them in hot water on a normal cycle (top vs front load washer) and had no issues (in the navy color). But do note, the tags say to wash in cold water. I prefer my towels washed in hot water.-They aren\'t cotton towels and will feel different on the skin during use. Once you get used to the difference (it may feel odd at first), they really perform well and are super soft. Think of letting them wick and pull the water away from you vs rubbing it off of you.-They do seem to take about 5 minutes longer than my cotton towels in the dryer.-I don\'t think when hung up to dry in the bathroom that they dry quite as fast as cotton towels. I did feel some moisture in them after hanging them up to dry.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 17, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Blanket or towel? 🤔', 'author': 'Jessica Beuttel', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These towels are so big and soft it feels as though you've wrapped yourself in your favorite cozy blanket! They are extremely absorbent and wick the water away quickly..... but I must say drying with them is a little different, one cannot just aggressively dry oneself, they must use the pat dry method, the material when wet likes to cling to you. Once you've mastered the new technique you'll wonder why you've used an other towel.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Soft but not so absorbent', 'author': 'Mel', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'These towels are soft and fluffy but they don’t seem very absorbent. They don’t slide over your skin right, they almost skid across your body.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Best towel I've ever used", 'author': 'Holden', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This towel is ridiculously absorbent, VERY large, and soft. Actually saves me time drying my hair compared to other towels.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Large in Luxury', 'author': 'Planet', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Super absorbing, plush and lasting softness.This is like wrapping yourself in your favorite chenille cuddle blanket the minute you step out of a shower or bath.The size is GINORMOUS a bath towel times two!Wonderful little loop in the center of the towel for hanging on a hook.I was worried about how the softness would hold up after washing, a dozen or more washes later & there is literally zero difference in softness.Wonderful for dying hair and body parts since this towel absorbs like a sponge.I purchased 2 packs, these fold up very nicely to all fit one one shelf despite them being double the length and width of a beach towel or bath towel.Excellent quality, beautiful to look at and a royal treatment for you.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "3.0 out of 5 stars Works and feels great. Looks great, but there's a serious drawback.", 'author': 'Brian W', 'rating': 3, 'content': "They clogged my dryer lint screen an inch deep the first time I washed them. For that reason, I worried they would leave visible lint all over when used. My fears were unfounded. I saw no lint and the towels dried great and felt great.They are so soft that it took some getting used to. I've washed and dried the towels at least twice. So why am I on here shopping for new towels?2 days ago, after drying my hands on one of the hand towels, I wanted to take a closer look at my hand, so I held it in front of a window with bright sunlight shining in. My hand was fine, but I noticed a cloud of grey (the color of my towel set) hairs floating all around my hand. I slowly pulled my hand down and the air cleared (mostly).I couldn't care less that I'm wearing invisible lint all over; I'm no health freak. I do care that I've been breathing in the lint for the past month.Perhaps this lint doesn't pose any health problems, but I'm not taking any chances. It's too late to return them, so these are going to goodwill or the garbage. Its sad, because I really liked them. I guess it's back to cotton for me.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 13, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Made for tall folks', 'author': 'Gloria Jo Roth', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love these towels , they are plenty big enough , absorb well , launder beautifully & have a handy hanging loop', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Ripped after 2nd wash', 'author': 'Hannah W.', 'rating': 1, 'content': "Two of the towels ripped after just two washes. Save your money. Don't buy these. They feel more like a blanket and they don't get you dry. The only thing that is good about them is the size.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So soft, very big towels', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': "It will take some getting used to going from terrycloth to these as they kind of remind me of a soft blanket with 2 layers. However, using the softer towel is so much better for my skin and it feels really good. I especially appreciated the extra touch with the the elastic loop attached to side for hanging up to dry. I'm really happy with my purchase.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Color is not dark', 'author': 'Dana Haines', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The towels are nice but they are not dark grey', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: 7-Pack Bath Towels - Extra-Absorbent - 100% Cotton - 27" x 52" (Neutrals)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Thin but Absorbant and SOFT', 'author': 'Ryman Review', 'rating': 5, 'content': "My daughter requested I purchase these for her new apartment, which of course I did. After the fact I read some of the reviews and quite frankly I was concerned and actually became a little anxious to receive our package. When we did get the package we were not disappointed. The towels were true to measurement. We washed them before using as you should any new linen no matter the type. The colors were still very vibrant and the towels were very soft. They showed very little shrinkage. These are not huge towels but they are large. They are bath towels and are true to size . They are thin but they are very absorbent.We used them the first time on the children after bath and they said they are so soft all they wanted to do is wrap up in them and cuddle for awhile. Of course later we had to use the towels ourselves and they are soft and you feel pampered a little using these towels. They are thin so they dry pretty quickly means no damp towel smell and the towels can be used a few times.If you're looking for daily towels these towels by Crystal Towels are nice cotton towels with a good absorbency and the current price is fair..", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 20, 2016', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great value - light but so absorbent!!', 'author': 'Miss DeeVee', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This towel set is a great value. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and large', 'author': 'myamazonaccount', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love how soft these are, and the large towels really body-sized!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft', 'author': 'Moneybagsnae', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These towels are the best towels I’ve owned thus far! Especially the way it came packaged up, I was exceedingly confused when I opened mine, I even paused mid-package-open to look at my order and make sure I got towels and not a blanket, but once I separated them all out there were in fact 4 oversized towels exactly as I ordered. I was still extremely skeptical about them as a towel because they feel like a soft microfiber baby blanket. I have mild sensory issues and I typically hate the feeling of microfiber towels, and I definitely didn't realize these were microfiber when I ordered them, but they don't have that icky sticky feeling that many microfiber wash cloths/kitchen towels have (to me). I used the towels for the first time and was thoroughly impressed. The towels are massive, I wish I had found these back when I was a lot bigger because back then a regular size bath towels couldn't close when I wrapped them around me, so I wasn't able to walk around in them after a shower. These wrap around me almost two full times, and because they're a little stretchy, when I move around, they're not tugging and coming undone. After using the towel, I'm dry, I'm comfy with it being so soft and wrapped around me, I have absolutely no complaints. I do see some reviews questioning the longevity of these, which I cannot speak to yet, but I'll be sure to update in another month or so after a few washes because if these do have some longevity to them, I'll absolutely be ordering more and replacing my entire stock of bath towels. I also don't currently have any dry skin spots, so for anyone concerned about the microfiber feeling on that, I also cannot speak to it, but if I get that ick feeling, I will immediately update this review bc I wish that microfiber ick on no one.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 18, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Texture is def. microfiber cloth not bath towel but work well', 'author': 'Reading while walking', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'So they will dry you off and look great. title: 100% Combed Cotton Bathroom Towel Set of 3- 1 Bath Towel, 1 Hand Towel, 1 Wash Cloth, Sustainable, Soft, Highly Absorbent 3 Piece Cotton Bath Towel Set Ideal for Hotels, Spa, Bathroom, Dorm, Blue
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The best towel set I have owned', 'author': 'Russell Kurtz', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Forty-five years ago I got a mismarked bath sheet that turned out to be top of the line, far better than the way it was marked. When it came time to replace my towels, I naturally tried to replace them with the same kind. Unfortunately one bath towel set of that type cost over $7000 now. After doing some research I found that, in general, what made towels good was (1) 100% Egyptian cotton (that\'s a type of cotton, not cotton from Egypt), (2) properly finished edges (so they don\'t unravel), and (3) heavy weight -- for a bath towel, over 700 grams per square meter (GSM). From the Celestia towels, I also found a fourth: well-designed weaving, which may be different for the washcloth than for the bath towel.Here I found a bath towel with >750 GSM, hand towel with ~700 GSM, and washcloth at about 650 GSM. All are absorbent and the washcloth\'s weave makes it comparatively easy to dry. These are all soft and comfortable (I\'ve been using them for three months), and, unlike every other towel set I\'ve owned, they don\'t get stiff after washing and drying. Even after 10 days\' use, my washcloth still dries flexible and soft on the rack; when I wash the towel set, they come out feeling as comfortable as after the first wash. And the price is impossible to beat! If I could have given this towel set six stars for "value for money" I would have.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 19, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!', 'author': 'Anne', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These washcloths are not only pretty but they are also a perfect match for my towels, seem very durable and are as soft as they possibly could be. Thank you for this wonderful product!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars "Good quality for the price paid"...', 'author': 'TheDaliLova', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I was seeking a pack of GRAY washcloths for a specific purpose and extras for facial drying, guest use etc. I had laser eye surgery many, many years ago and afterwards it became clear that I was on a Refresh Plus eye drops nightly usage plan for life. As a result, I end up with crusty eye jam in the morning which isn\'t always easy to gently wipe away with a damp washcloth. I have found that a thinner cloth is better and ideally soft, but not too soft. This cloth falls into that category as it is on the thinner side without being ultra-thin and it is soft, but not as soft as the thicker more high-end ones. The material quality grade is about a A- or B+ so you won\'t mistake it as coming from a 4 or 5 star hotel bathroom. In a nutshell, they aren\'t winning any "seamstress of the year" awards with inconsistent threading at times, but they aren\'t bargain basement looking either. If you are the type of person that is highly sensitive to visual flaws, these are likely not for you, but otherwise they are pretty nice looking if you don\'t examine them too closely.That being said, for the price paid, the value is good. And for my purposes they are on point and the gray color goes with our modern condo look and color theme. I wouldn\'t be embarrassed for a guest to use them but I definitely was a little embarrassed with our 1975 (okay, I exaggerate, maybe 2002) weathered mismatched washcloths, hand towels and bath towels that we had up until the past year when I began phasing them out. I usually prefer a blend so they don\'t fade too soon, but cotton works better for my eye cleaning needs and at the price paid it should be all good either way.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 21, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Absorbent and pretty thick', 'author': 'Michelle', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was surprised at how thick they are. Usually wash clothes are just thin and junky unless I buy expensive. But these are a good happy medium. On the thicker side and not too expensive. And they’re actually absorbent while staying soft wash after wash.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 17, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The Best!!!', 'author': 'Tamela Anderson', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I love the thickness and texture! Easy to clean, doesn't lose it's color.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not terible for $28 (on sale) but NOT 700-GSM! Only bath towel came close to 500-GSM.', 'author': "Noah's Ark", 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I ordered the Silver Gray towel set for $28 on sale. I figured at that price they might still be worth the money even if they turned out to be a mediocre towel. I was right to definitely not spend a penny more on these towels!They are not anywhere near 700-GSM in weight. But at least the full bath towel is sufficiently absorbent to do the job and dries well. The hand towel and wash cloth are too thin to function properly.Details:Only the bath towel comes even close to 500-GSM. The hand towel might be as much as 400-GSM. The wash cloth is the worst of all at something closer to 150-GSM! The wash towel is so thin that it barely holds any water or soap lather and has an extremely rough surface texture. It feels like you are scrubbing with an exfoliating pumice cloth!For $28 a set, the price is not too bad given the extremely mediocre quality!Recommendation:Buy an Amazon Brand Pinzon towel instead like the Pinzon Organic Cotton Bathroom Towels . The six-towel set is sometimes on sale for only $38 and all towels in the set are truly 700-GSM with a very thick and soft absorbent texture.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars where have you been all these years', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Best towel set I have ever bought. Texture, size ,absorbancy it is everything I look for in a towel set.Can't comment on wear, only washed twice. love the smart hanging loop on all 3 pieces, it is a plus honestly.Looking forward to getting two more sets.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Tal vez para otra persona sea de buena calidad', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Quizás sea de buena calidad, pero no para mi gusto.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Normal', 'author': 'Alexander', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Just as I expected', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Basically fine', 'author': 'tom', 'rating': 3, 'content': "The towels are fine, decent quality material and weave, but on the thin side. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Towel - Super Soft - Feels like a Spa!', 'author': 'D', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Ok, so these towels did feel like a Spa towel. So soft, and comfortable. They are beautiful, and the colors I selected created harmony with my bathroom interior design. They absorbed water towel drying off after a shower but did not feel soaked, or super damp like some towels do. If you prefer a thicker towel then please be aware these towels are thinner, but they do the job rather well. For me I prefer a thinner towel because they dry faster in the dryer and that is a money saver. When I bought a heavier, thicker towel set from Amazon a few years back they took forever to dry and used more power which is expensive. One thing to keep in mind is after the first wash there was a lot of new towel cotton in the lint trap, but the towels were not fraying or looking less desriable. Overall I recommend this towel if you are not looking for a thick cotton towel. title: Popular Bath Contempo Collection, Towel Set, Spice
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with this set!!', 'author': 'Cathy', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This set is gorgeous...the curtain has weight to it and the colors are very rich. The towels are more of a golden beige with an exact match of the silky shower curtain material and fringes...very happy with this color coordinate. In response to a couple of reviewers expecting to see red in the curtains...if you zoom in, but I think at fast glance also, I never saw any red in this ensemble..it's all shades of browns, golds and greens.The rug - nice length but nowhere near as luxurious looking as the curtain and towels. It's thin which doesn't bother me but the colors are very dull, bland if you will, no where near as rich and vibrant looking as the other material pieces. Also, the border of the rug is orange which doesn't match any of the colors in the set. I am returning it and will purchase a rug in the dark brown/dark gold family when I can find one in a store that I can see for myself.The accessories (I have the garbage pail, the tumbler and the soap dispenser and shower hooks). The colors are very rich. I think they're made from resin - they're very sturdy but too bad they weren't ceramic...while the colors are true to the rest of the set, the accessories are, in my opinion, not AS luxurious looking but I will keep them, I don't hate them. The shower hooks are nice - again, an exact match to the curtain colors but I have seen this set pictured with simple golden ball shower hooks which looked pretty as well. You can go either way with the hooks and still be happy with it.The set is truly luxurious, sorry, I keep calling it that but it's true. The Contempo set really gave the room a whole new look...it was money well spent!Hope this helps everyone. Enjoy your new ensemble if you buy it!!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2012', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful set.', 'author': 'Sol y Luna', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'It looks amazing. I purchased a light beige liner (it is longer,hangs below the curtain and peeks above as one reviewer mentioned) but it is too light as there is no beige in this curtain. All the colors are bold and dark. A brown shower curtain liner would have worked better so I might dye the one I bought (its fabric). I did not have the color contrast between the valance and the curtain that someone mentioned, They are both the same vibrant color. This is not a review given because i got this for discount although i may look into that option for the future.I almost always love everything I get from amazon and I'm thinking its because I read the reviews.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 8, 2016', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The soap dish', 'author': 'Celestino Rocha Rodriguez', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Used it to put a bar of soap in it the color started to come offUsed it to put a bar of soap in it the color started to come off', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 7, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

I went to try to tear one of the tags at the perforation and it tore some threads causing a small tear in the fabric and a bit of an unroll in the edge. I had to cut the rest. They aren’t as soft as I expected from other reviews. Especially the washcloths. The bath and hand towels are decent but still not as soft as I’d hoped. The wash cloth seemed to rough when used on my face compared to other towels i own. I washed them once before first use, and I use vinegar for fabric softener with a little fragrance oil, and a non toxic homemade detergent, in the dryer is 6 wool dryer balls with fragrance matching the drops in wash. Maybe they will soften after a few more wash cycles. Quality seems average to me. They seem to kind of get wrinkled on the edges fairly easily. Overall I don’t mind them but I don’t have anything wonderful to say either, but as I said, they are pretty and maybe softness will get better the more they are washed. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I am very pleased at softness and absorbency!', 'author': 'Oma Kitty', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I read the reviews, ordered, received, washed immediately due to reviews...These are really nice towels. I practically step out of the shower, give myself a quick once-over, and bam – I'm dry. It's like it has this secret superpower for sucking up water in record time. It's not trying too hard, just quietly making everything look a bit more put together.Sure, it might cost a bit more than your average towel, but let me tell you, it's worth every penny. Treat yourself to the good stuff – you won't regret it. title: Microfiber Lightweight Bath Towel Set 4 Bath Towels 4 Hand Towels 4 Colors for Shower Pool Beach Bathroom Super Absorbent Soft Quick Dry
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Feels Like a Soft Blanket', 'author': 'Mare G.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Just received my striped multi colored towels. The yellow one is beige, not yellow. I was hoping for the yellow color as it looks in the picture. The other colors aren't as vibrant looking in person. They washed and dried beautifully. There was hardly no lint/shredding in the dryer. These towels are unlike any other towel I've ever used. They feel like a chenille blanket and absorbs every drop of water! They are a decent size and the handtowel is very generous. I wish washcloths would have been part of the set. I will repurchase in the future.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Thin, but very absorbent.', 'author': 'Danielle Weiss', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The media could not be loaded. When I took these out of the packaging I was a little nervous because they are so thin, but after using them, that doesn’t even matter. Very absorbent, dried me off in no time after I got out of the shower. And the softness on these is unmatched. Feels like a cloud. I was a little worried because sometimes microfiber has that dry scratchy feeling to them, but not these. Really good material. The size on them is great, was able to wrap myself up nicely after the shower and the washcloth is large enough you could possibly wrap your hair in it. I have one hanging in my bathroom by the sink to be used as a hand towel. Love that they have little loops on them to hang up to dry. Definitely wash them before using, I didn’t notice any weird smell like some other reviews stated, but I feel like washing them gets rid of some of the shedding that new towels often have that then get stuck to your wet body if you don’t wash them before their first use. Also, can’t beat the price for 4 large bath towels and 4 large washcloths.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 18, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not as described', 'author': 'Natasha', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Product description states four hand towels and four bath towels. title: Extra Large Bath Towel Set, 4 Piece Black Oversized Bath Sheets 35"x70"-Soft, Quick Dry, Super Absorbent, Diamond Pattern Microfiber Bath Sheets for Bathroom, Beach, Travel, Fitness, Yoga
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and large', 'author': 'myamazonaccount', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love how soft these are, and the large towels really body-sized!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft', 'author': 'Moneybagsnae', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These towels are the best towels I’ve owned thus far! They are long enough to wrap around my 300+ frame. They are very absorbent. If you don’t exfoliate you’ll notice the extra skin that rolls off when you dry off it doesn’t hurt. My husband has a lot of body hair and he says it’s an adjustment from using a regular towel', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased', 'author': 'Nancy', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Soft texture and nice pattern', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars These are def not cotton', 'author': 'Matt D.', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I bought these because I wanted some extra inexpensive towels for home. I didn’t really pay attention when preferring them but they are all polyester. Kind of the texture of a fleece blanket. That being said they work pretty good, dry fast, wash nicely and super soft just not the normal texture of a towel.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Blanket-like, but actually lovely as a towel', 'author': 'Carly Nichole', 'rating': 5, 'content': "As many other reviews mention, it's like a blanket. Especially the way it came packaged up, I was exceedingly confused when I opened mine, I even paused mid-package-open to look at my order and make sure I got towels and not a blanket, but once I separated them all out there were in fact 4 oversized towels exactly as I ordered. I was still extremely skeptical about them as a towel because they feel like a soft microfiber baby blanket. I have mild sensory issues and I typically hate the feeling of microfiber towels, and I definitely didn't realize these were microfiber when I ordered them, but they don't have that icky sticky feeling that many microfiber wash cloths/kitchen towels have (to me). I used the towels for the first time and was thoroughly impressed. The towels are massive, I wish I had found these back when I was a lot bigger because back then a regular size bath towels couldn't close when I wrapped them around me, so I wasn't able to walk around in them after a shower. These wrap around me almost two full times, and because they're a little stretchy, when I move around, they're not tugging and coming undone. After using the towel, I'm dry, I'm comfy with it being so soft and wrapped around me, I have absolutely no complaints. I do see some reviews questioning the longevity of these, which I cannot speak to yet, but I'll be sure to update in another month or so after a few washes because if these do have some longevity to them, I'll absolutely be ordering more and replacing my entire stock of bath towels. I also don't currently have any dry skin spots, so for anyone concerned about the microfiber feeling on that, I also cannot speak to it, but if I get that ick feeling, I will immediately update this review bc I wish that microfiber ick on no one.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 18, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Texture is def. microfiber cloth not bath towel but work well', 'author': 'Reading while walking', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'So they will dry you off and look great. It straight up feels like you’re using a microfiber cloth but they do their job. The color is rich, great pattern, and no lint after washing. They hold up really well. Personally, since the texture ended up bothering me for a towel, I have been using them as throws since they’re really warm. They look nice draped across the sofa arms since they are a nice large size. You can’t tell they aren’t blankets.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Very thin and stitching unraveled after only two washings', 'author': 'Jim', 'rating': 1, 'content': "cheaply made. stitching around the edges unraveled when washed. very thin. don't buy. these are a waste of money.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft!', 'author': 'Lisa Keeton', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The material is pretty this but the towels are giant and super soft. There’s also a small loop for hanging.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very absorbent', 'author': 'beverly.a.hayden', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I was a little worried when I received the towels because of how thin they felt. I used one and was amazed at how they dried the moisture off instantly. I'll be getting more for gift bags for my kids this Xmas.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I brag about these towels', 'author': 'Eric Wertz', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These towels are more absorbent than traditional towels some how. May be due to micro fiber-like feel.At first they felt thinner, and cheaply made, but they dry my body and hair faster than traditional towel weave.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

Very observant and soft and I’ll be ordering again!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not like the ones I bought years ago', 'author': 'Sheppy', 'rating': 3, 'content': "So I originally bought a set of these towels about 8 years ago. LOVED THEM! Thick, but not too thick, absorbent, and washed/dried perfectly. Still have them and use them. I wanted a new color so of course I came back to these towels. Boy did they change! They are thin. Not as bad as motel towels, but close. They do seem to be made well, the color was spot on, and the measurements were true... but they are not the same quality as the original towels I got years ago. The reason for the decent rating? Climate change is REAL people! Which means my house is a million times more humid than it ever was before. Consequently, thick towels never dry and always smell like mildew, even when clean. These guys are thin enough that they air dry well, so no dampness or mildew smell. I guess I'm changing my expectations along with time changing things (like the damn weather). Overall, for the price I think these towels are a good deal. If you're not looking for plush, thick towels, but ones that get the job done and are wellmade, I think these will do. title: Ben Kaufman Promo Jacq Towel - Oversized Beach & Pool Towel - Absorbent & Quick-Drying Beach Essential - Assorted Color Cotton Towels - Versatile & Large Swimming Towels - 12 Pack
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great price', 'author': 'Charles', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These towels are bright large and colorful. There a little bit thinner but if your going to the beach who wants to carry thick heavy towels. I would highly recommend them.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 8, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars The cheapest towels I have ever seen!', 'author': 'Jessica N', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'I got these towels for lining cat cages, so I picked them based on the fact that they were the least expensive option that was still 100% cotton. These towels are the shoddiest, cheapest towels I have ever seen! They’re so thin that they are literally transparent, but the yarn loops are big enough that you can make a hole just by pulling on the fabric. The threads snag at the slightest touch and break, so even pulling the plastic MSRP tag off left dangling threads. I’m going to put them through a wash /dry cycle before using them, but looking at the fabric I fully expect them to disintegrate in the wash. I’ll update this review if that happens.For my purposes, they’re fine- I’m using them to line the bottom of cat carriers to house chickens overnight when it’s too cold outside. But if you’re looking for a towel for the beach or the bath, keep looking. Even $5 ikea towels look downright luxurious next to these poor rags.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Wrong color. Poor quality.', 'author': 'Meg M', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I ordered the set of 6. The towels pictured are vibrant and fun. I got some dark sad looking turtles lol also, these aren’t absorbent at all and are really uncomfortable to dry off with. Will be returning.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 15, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good product', 'author': 'Rob', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Good product,will buy again', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Must wash first. They do shed lint for at least the 2 first washes.', 'author': 'Phonecianpilot', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Torn. Must wash & dry at least 2 times by themselves, before use. There is a lot of colorful lint post the 2 dryings. They are some-what see-through as others have said. They do get softer with washings. They dry quickly, and absorb well and even better with successive washing. They dry quickly at the beach and shake off sand well. They dry quickly when hung over a chair by the pool. I appreciate that they are not too heavy for the stacked washer/dryer unit at our beach place. They did not appear to shrink. They are lightweight & not too thick to pack into a suitcase. I have other heavier plush beach towels that I like better, but for what they are, (and what I wish to use them for - like travel & beach): I would purchase them again.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 21, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for', 'author': 'Tricia', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'This package of Towels came wrapped in plastic inside an amazon box. I expected a bit more than what I got. Almost each one of the towels had snags on the towel in multiple locations or frayed on the edges. I also washed all towels before using and cleaned my lint tray out before and after putting them in the dryer. A TON of lint was removed (see 2nd to last pic). When I opened the dryer I quickly noticed the lint pocket was full and overflowing and the some of the excess lint came flying out at me when I opened the dryer door. The towels are very very thin and almost see through as shown in the last pic. The towels did wipe off the water, however there was still so much lint on the towels that transferred to our body when we used the towels. These towels will suffice if you just need some cheap bulk towels, however if you are looking for something nicer... this is not the right pic', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 26, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great value', 'author': 'Neal Willey', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Ordered these for a large group coming to visit and we needed more pool towels. They arrived fast. They aren’t the thickest quality but they got the job done and are very colorful. We washed them and there was no excessive lint etc. Would order again.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to beat for the price', 'author': 'Cate H', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very pleased with the product size an price', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars The towels of shame', 'author': 'averybadcat', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'Total losers. These do not deserve to be called towels. They are so thin you can see right through them, and they are totally non-absorbent and feel unpleasant on your skin. They are also supposed to be assorted but I got four identical ugly dark ones and one slightly lighter color (more navy blue, not as much black) but still ugly. I was really hoping for at least one yellow one since the pictures show very bright colors including yellow. I got black and gray, maroon-black, olive green-black and the same thing on the other side. They also have an obnoxious intense chemical smell like they have been in a container with fish and I had to wash them twice in a detergent with built-in fragrance to get rid of it, and I don\'t like using perfumed detergent. If they get wet at all, the fish smell comes back. Yes, they would be good as beach towels as far as being something to lie on instead of directly on the sand. Period. That\'s all they can say for themselves. A flat sheet would be better. They are not any good for drying off. Yes, they shake off the sand and they dry quickly, but that is because there is not enough fabric for the sand to stick to in the first place, they are coarse, and they dry fast because they never absorb enough water to actually get wet. Even as a towel after showering at home, they don\'t dry you off. Also, with beach towels it is helpful if you can recognize your towel and find your spot because of the towel color or brightness, and it is part of the fun of being at the beach to stake out your spot and lie on an oversized towel, and these are just grim. Who would want to slink up to such a depressing spot? I would not visit them upon guests who were going to the beach. As for product versatility, I almost cut these up into bed liners for my cat carriers but my cats deserve something more comfortable. Instead I am using these towels for car seat covers. Also when my mop wore out and I needed something to clean the floor with, I soaked the towels in a bucket (it took a LONG time) and then I pushed them around the floor with my feet.I hated this purchase as soon as I saw the "assortment" of colors they had sent me and everything else confirmed that impression of a letdown. I knew they were not going to be high-end towels for the price, but even as bargain basement towels they are very disappointing. I do not recommend.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Thin and sheds', 'author': 'ColFitz', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'These towels are not worth it. We purchased because we needed at a vacation house and they had a quick delivery. They are paper thin and even after a few washes they continued to shed fabric onto people.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice towels. Great quality.', 'author': 'Sapheara311', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'These are great towels and they’re great quality. Very thick.', 'author': 'SMM2&3', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Love these towels. They are very thick and absorbent. Washed before using with no issues. I got the dark grey and it is very dark. Very masculine. My husband really likes because I usually buy white so it's something different. They also don't leave fluff. The last towels I purchased had a really soft side but they left fluff over my husbands beard and he hated it. These are nice and terry cloth on both sides so no fluff. Great value for the set.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 12, 2022', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect towel!', 'author': 'Adreanna Greenfield', 'rating': 5, 'content': "These are great! I either end up buying towels that are too fluffy soft or thin and rough. These are neither. Very well made thick quality cotten towels. They aren't too soft and by no means rough, perfect feel! I'm amazed at how absorbent they are as well, toweled off after showering and the towel still felt surprisingly dry.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 7, 2022', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and soft, but could feel more luxurious', 'author': 'Andrew', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I ordered a set of six dark gray towels, which the product description indicates are "woven with 100% ring spun Turkish cotton". That must be true because the towels are labeled "Made in Turkey" with "100% Turkish Cotton".The set comes tied up with a ribbon, so it looks nice enough to be a gift. It includes two oversized bath towels (claimed 30"x54", actual 28"x53.5"), two hand towels (claimed 16"x30", actual 15"x29"), and two face towels (claimed 13"x13", actual 14"x11.5"). Claimed measurements were written on the packaging. My actual measurements were taken before the first wash. Standard towels are 20"x40" and large hotel towels are 30"x60", so these bath towels were close enough to large hotel towels to justify Amazon\'s "Hotel Spa Bath Towels" description.These towels are definitely super-soft, fluffy and plush. The rings of cotton are small and low-profile that feel gentle against the skin, but the bath towels don\'t seem as absorbent as thicker towels. All three types of towels use the same material, which is fine for the face towels but seems too thin to make the bath towels feel luxurious. The thickness reminds me of terry toweling dish cloths. Too early to comment about the durability of the towels.The packaging indicates the cotton material has undergone OEKO-TEX/STANDARD 100 testing that proves it contains no chemicals harmful to human health (or at the very least, below limits set by European standards). For what it\'s worth, I verified the certificate number with OEKO-TEX and it confirmed the material was a 100% cotton terry towel, but didn\'t identify "ceoberry" as the company. Presumably they don\'t manufacture the cotton material.In summary, these towels feel nice and soft, but could feel more luxurious if they were thicker. But pretty good for the price.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 3, 2022', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love these towels, nice high quality.', 'author': 'wblisspd1114', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am so happy I purchased these towels. They are very absorbent and dry quickly. They also wash very nicely. They are thick and rich looking. I love the little bit larger size of the hand towels. I highly recommend it.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 8, 2022', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the money', 'author': 'J_8675309', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Packaged well. The hand towels looked like a different gray before I washed them, but all was good after I took them out of the dryer. I noticed one seam slightly coming undone, but I just cut it off. I will say, I’ve had very expensive towels do this as well, so don’t judge from that. These towels are soft enough, thick enough and dry well. Barely any shedding after the first wash, which is common with a lot of towels. Great price for six towels. These are not top of the line towels, but you should know that with the price you’re paying, but a great option if you’re on a budget.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 1, 2022', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful soft and fluffy', 'author': 'Jeff Narup', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great towels thick and soft great quality', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars fluffy', 'author': 'David Rich', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'very beautiful and high quality', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 12, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Good towels', 'author': 'י', 'rating': 1, 'content': "It's good and cheap", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Microfiber Bath Towels Set, 10-Piece Ultra Soft Towels for Bathroom, Absorbent Microfiber Towels for Body, Quick Dry Towel Sets for Bathroom, Beach, Pool, Gym, Yoga(10-Piece, Ultimate Gray)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Leave you feeling squeaky clean and completely dry.', 'author': 'Dani M.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I bought these to use as guest towels when company was coming to town. After days of research, reading hundreds of reviews and comparing every last detail, these towels were the winners. I was reluctant to by microfiber towels because I didn’t want my towels to feel or look like something you’d dry your car off with. They look and feel nothing like car towels, they are so soft it’s insane and undeniably beautiful, not cheap looking or feeling at all. I had 4 guests use these towels and each of them came up to me and raved about these towels. It was chilly one night and my SIL was walking around wearing one like a throw blanket because she said it was so soft and cozy hahaha. They were a huge hit! Everyone asked for the link to buy their own set for their homes. I have spent an embarrassing amount of money on high end towel sets in the past and have never had a guest even mention anything about their towel experience prior to buying these. You can’t beat the price, the sizes are perfect and colors are vibrant. One of the most important details I found out about when researching microfiber towels is if they have a finished hem, which these do. That was the final deciding factor in choosing these towels and I’m glad I did because other towel sets look very similar but they have no hem and frankly look cheap and unfinished. If you give these towels a try, you’ll be microfiber converted too. They are also amazing for drying your hair after a shower, the absorbency is insane.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Best towels I've ever bought! PERFECT for our RV!", 'author': 'Shopping Ninja', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I bought these towels for our RV, since we need something that is lightweight and will dry very quickly. I've never owned microfiber towels before and these have turned out to be the best towels we've ever had. They are very plush, similar to the surface of a microfiber blanket only with a bit lighter nap. They absorb water instantly! You just have to lay the towel on the surface of your skin and you're dry! We love that, since we don't have a lot of room in the RV shower to be waving a big towel around. They have a loop sewn into the edge of each towel which lets you hang them on a hook. The loop is somewhat small and may not last as long as the towels do, but so far none of the loops have torn after many uses.The towels also wash beautifully and the color has not faded at all. They were so inexpensive for the set that I anticipated they'd be rather marginal quality. Instead, they've turned out to be a wonderful value and I've already bought a second set for our RV. We hang them on hooks in the shower when we've used them and they usually are completely dry within 2 or 3 hours.I read the negative reviews that talk about how they feel like drying off on a microfiber blanket. Of course they do, they're microfiber towels. What do people think they're going to feel like? If you want a towel that feels like terry cloth, you should buy terry cloth towels. If you want a very soft, VERY absorbent towel that dries quickly, these are ideal.I'll probably replace the towels in our master bath with these, we're so happy with how they've worked out in the RV. Definitely five stars!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 7, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely the best, what a change from traditional cotton towels', 'author': 'Anthony J Marella', 'rating': 5, 'content': "If you grew up in the 60's, 70's and 80's cotton towels were always used for showers, beach and pool then they become towels to watch the car or clean the stove with. A family member undergone cancer treatment, the radiation burned his skin making his back break out and inflamed, normal cotton towels even Egyptian cotton when drying off caused pain. I did a search for chemo radiation towels, these were recommended. I ordered them, they are amazing, they helped dry the body off, no pain or rash from drying even cotton felt too rough. these towels are absorbent, they don't glide like towels do but they are extremely soft and light weight. We ordered two more sets and gave them as a housewarming gift. I recommend these for sensitive skin, for those who undergo chemo and radiation and for those who like soft bath towels, they don't smell of mildew or wet towels either", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 18, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars NOTE: The super soft texture prevents them from being easy to use!', 'author': 'Trask', 'rating': 4, 'content': "These towels are really big. Which is great! That is what I wanted.Great Beach Towel too Big for Drying off after Bath/Shower.To start with the good news they are really soft and about the same thickness maybe even thicker than my old Traditional Type of Towel. When dry they feel awesome against my skin. They look great. I like the diamond pattern.It is the Texture that stops them from being easy to use!?! Who would have thought?!?The Microfiber Towel has Tufted Fibers which somewhat resemble a standard towel. My old towel for comparison has more stringlike tufts and because it's a Cotton Poly blend it doesn't cling to my skin the way these towels do. ( I also bought the set of 10 matching towels and that has 6 facecloths.) The face cloths are a great example of the clinginess of the fabric. You can't just wipe your face or scrub your forehead with them as I was used to with the traditional type of facecloth. It stuck to my face and was nearly impossible to rub with. I had to ball it up to create air space that let me use it. I will buy use regular face cloths from now on! That effect happens in large scale with the 40X80 Towels. They want to just cling to my back getting them to move back and forth was a problem of physics. Resistance and Slack! I used the standard size towels instead as I could get a better grip on the shorter length and be able to keep it taut enough to pull the towel across my back and defeat the super cling. I would recommend these as beach towels where you want to wrap up in something soft and warm and then the fabric will whisk the water away and dry you off. I am sure the kids will love being wrapped up in them after a bath. So, I give the 40X80 Beach Towel 5 stars but only as a beach towel or after shower wrap. As a bath towels they're a 3 at best because of the clinginess. That is why I gave them 4 Stars.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 16, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am Diagnose with CRPS which causes me to be sensitive to touch. Because of this I cannot use regular towels because they leave scratch marks on my face and skin.This is very soft and feel great on my skin. Very worth the buy. I need to get more.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 2, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very soft love the big size', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 28, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Cheaply finished but does the job.', 'author': 'Meghan', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I have a tiny bathroom with no bars to hang towels. I was looking for some with loops like IKEA sells. These have loops and the microfiber is more absorbent than cotton terry. However they were just cheaply finished. The trim is not a good color match and they sewed my dark teal towels with white thread. I knew it was a really low price but come on. I’m probably going to keep them as I like the color. I’ll just have fix them up myself.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Extra Large and Absorbent', 'author': 'Heidi', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I didn't want to believe what I read. I liked the idea of the extra large size. I decided to purchase because of the size. When they arrived, I saw blankets, not towels. It was confusing because towels have a different look normally. After using them for the first time, I am convinced that these are the best towels I have ever used. They are absorbent, warm, and absolutely huge!!!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars SOLID COLOR are highly absorbent and dry quickly BUT the DIAMOND PATTERN not so much', 'author': 'busdriver', 'rating': 4, 'content': "After 3 months of use, I think these microfiber towels are a winner as long as you stick to the solid color variety. I bought these to try based on reviews of similar items by others. Living in Florida with high humidity cotton towels tend to 'sour' fast and take a long time to dry on the towel rack between uses. These microfiber towels (solid color variety) on the other hand dry much quicker and remain fresher longer than their cotton cousins.Purchased a second set in the TEAL DIAMOND pattern and they are nowhere near as absorbent, nor do they dry as rapidly as the solid color variety. Also the nape appears and feels different.So I would highly recommend the solid color towels but WOULD NOT recommend the diamond pattern variety.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 21, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Best Towels', 'author': 'Christina M. Owens', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The softest towels I’ve ever felt! Originally was given them as a Xmas gift and liked them so much I bought more. These are great for all weather seasons too. Dry you off fast when it’s hot and also keep you warm when it’s cold with the plush microfiber.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 22, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Towels- Viscose Made from Bamboo Cotton Bath Towels-27x54inch - Natural, Ultra Absorbent Towels for Bathroom (6 Piece Set) (Light Grey)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for!', 'author': 'Brenda Wilson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was a little concerned when I saw how small the package was that the Amazon guy left on the porch! I was also a little concerned when I saw how lightweight and soft these were. Could these possibly work well? so I washed them and put one out for my shower this morning and I am convinced. These are absolutely wonderful towels! If you want a huge fluffy bath towel, you won’t like these. But that is not what I wanted.
